titles.title: A bill to establish requirements for quality and discard dates that are, at the option of food labelers, included in food packaging, and for other purposes.
Food Date Labeling Act of 2019
Food Date Labeling Act of 2019
Food Date Labeling Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
